text: John Boswall (2 May 1920 â€“ 6 June 2011) was a British actor. He was best known for playing Barrow in Three Men and a Little Lady and as Wyvern in Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest (2006). Boswall was born in Oxford, Oxfordshire. His career began in 1970 and he retired in 2009. Boswall died of pancreatic cancer on 6 June 2011 in South Woodchester, Gloucestershire at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2011 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British voice actors Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Actors from Oxford
title: John Boswall
